snippet: Shares of eBay and McDonald’s were higher after their quarterly reports beat analysts’ expectations.
abstract: Stocks rise sharply after two-day slump.
lead_paragraph: Shares of eBay and McDonald’s were higher after their quarterly reports beat analysts’ expectations.

headline.print_headline: Wall St. Is Lifted by Earnings and Hope for a European Stimulus
headline.main: Wall St. Rises After Strong Earnings Reports
